name: Rotation Panic
description:
Controls

P1 | A
P2 | L

Objective

Move yourself towards where you point using A or L
Get the power-up and kill the opponent by touching him

Credits

Music is "Arcade Puzzler" by Eric Matyas
Font is "Boo City" by Tyler Finck

* This game was made for Weekly Game Jam 107 - "Don't touch it!"
